named-query.name: beers[8]
named-query.query: select b from Beer b where b.alcohol = 8

named-query.name: beers[5-8]
named-query.query: select b from Beer b where b.alcohol between 5 and 8 order by b.alcohol asc

named-query.name: beers[4,6,8,10]
named-query.query: select b from Beer b where b.alcohol in(4,6,8,10)

named-query.name: beers[kriek]
named-query.query: select b from Beer b where b.name like '%kriek%'

named-query.name: beers[gent]
named-query.query: select b from Beer b where b.brewer.zipCode = '9000'

named-query.name: beers[gent]bis
named-query.query: select b from Beer b join b.brewer br where br.zipCode = '9000'

named-query.name: beers[tripel]
named-query.query: select b from Beer b where b.category.name = 'tripel'

named-query.name: category[9]
named-query.query: select distinct b.category from Beer b where b.alcohol = 9

named-query.name: category[9]bis
named-query.query: select distinct c from Category as c join c.beers b where b.alcohol = 9

named-query.name: brewer[10]
named-query.query: select distinct b.brewer from Beer b where b.alcohol = 10

named-query.name: brewer[10]bis
named-query.query: select distinct br from Brewer br join br.beers b where b.alcohol = 10

named-query.name: brewer[pils]
named-query.query: select distinct b.brewer from Beer b where b.category.name = 'pils'

named-query.name: brewer[pils]bis
named-query.query: select distinct br from Brewer as br JOIN br.beers b where b.category.name = 'pils'

named-query.name: report[alcohol]
named-query.query: select b.alcohol, count(b) from Beer b group by b.alcohol

named-query.name: report[city]
named-query.query: select b.brewer.city, count(b) from Beer b group by b.brewer.city having count(b) >= 10

named-query.name: beers[strongest]
named-query.query: select b from Beer b where b.alcohol = (select max(be.alcohol) from Beer be)

named-query.name: averagePrice[pils]
named-query.query: select avg(b.price) from Beer b where b.category.name='pils'
